> "No my dear"replied Hydras"It isn't the Ark, unlucky, I don't know 
> its current location... In future, this will be mont Etna"and typed 
> some buttons "currently, this is the place"
> 
> Instead a volcano appeared somthing like a big crater full of lava 
> and blast of fire

She looked at it blankly. Rather curious & not sure what to say in 
response to Hydras not knowing the location of the Ark. Should she 
tell him? Perhaps not yet. 

Still she was a little confused. But studied the place before 
her. "You intend to move the base to... here?" Then looking at 
him. "Or had you something else in mind?"
